item.title: Example config.toml
item.description: Example config.toml configuration for Minimo: baseURL = "http://www.example.com" title = "点道为止 - 点道社" # for smart copyright line, leave this blank and check [params.copyright] copyright = "" theme = "minimo" disqusShortname = "" googleAnalytics = "" Paginate = 50 preserveTaxonomyNames = true enableRobotsTXT = true # generate robots.txt # Syntax Highlighting ( https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/ ) pygmentsCodefences = true # Missing translations will default to this content language defaultContentLanguage = "en" [params.info] description = "梦入神机《点道为止》粉丝交流社区" title404 = "Nothing's here!
